channel.title: Need Mod to Disable "Only" Smoke
channel.description:
Hi Folk and others^^
Please, BM-Team (or someone) give me/us a mod that disable the smoke.
I play EP1/2 and this game Rocks in 3D, cause i could turn on 8xMSAA! This Mean , no flickering! Clear Vision! (No other Game Looks like this)
But in BM if i turn 3D that means SBS ~ 1080p@60FPS@8xMSAA the FPS goes down to ~15 and this looks really shitty :frowning:
If u only could bring us a "mod" that disable the smoke effects, not the particles@all cause they are greate (smoke 2! but hey 8xMSAA in 3D SBS!!)
If you could do it, or anybody have a solution, whrite it dooown!
PS: Is it really so, that the particles like smoke/sparks/fire are in one file, that couldnt be disabled at once?
HL2/EP1/Ep2 runs so good, really at 60fps with 8SMAA at 1080p SBS I really would love to play this game without hitting "M" :/
I know im not really good in english speacking, but huu, write it down in german :fffuuu:
I know i could hit "M" to disable all the glorious things with this "autoexe" to play it smooth, but it would be really a big improfment if somebody could turn the smoke"only" off or altering some other, faster smoke effects to this game...
Beispiel: texture_budget_panel_x 550 texture_budget_panel_y 112 texture_budget_panel_height 450 texture_budget_panel_width 512 budget_panel_x 0 budget_panel_y 50 budget_panel_height 900 budget_panel_width 512
alias BudgetShow "sv_cheats 1; +showbudget; showbudget_texture 1; alias BudgetToggle BudgetHide;" alias BudgetHide "-showbudget; sv_cheats 0; showbudget_texture 0; alias BudgetToggle BudgetShow;" alias BudgetToggle "BudgetShow;" bind b BudgetToggle bind n "incrementvar texture_budget_panel_global 0 1 1"
alias DynamicOn "r_dynamic 1; r_dynamiclighting 1; alias DynamicToggle DynamicOff;" alias DynamicOff "r_dynamic 0; r_dynamiclighting 0; alias DynamicToggle DynamicOn;" alias DynamicToggle "DynamicOff" bind "u" "DynamicToggle;"
bind "j" "incrementvar r_WaterDrawReflection 0 1 1;" bind "m" "incrementvar r_drawparticles 0 1 1;"
I did that resurch and find out 8xMSAA isnt that performant with SMOKE...at all ...the other effects dont do nothing to the performance!
